0.content:
[Translate as part of a Yugioh card like description. Be as consice, short, and as accurate as possible. Replace the Chinese text with the English translation.

The elements a card can be (EG: Water, Fire Dark etc) is called "Attribute"
The type a card (EG: Rouge, Warrior, Hunter etc) is called "Type".
Attributes and Types are always capitalized. EG: "Hunter Type" or "Fire Attribute".
Removing or destorying a card from the game is called "banishing" a card.
The discard pile is called the "Graveyard". This word should be capitalized.
Statuses are labeled as [Status Name (X)] where X is the effect number if any.

Effects are marked as [X] where X is the effect number. The description must be after this number.
Effects that depend on the number must be descripted as X, and then defining what X is equal to.
EG: "[1]. Select a character on the field. Increase that character's attack power by 400 x X (X = the number of cards equipped)."
If a trap/ability card has an activation condition, the description must with "If..."
If a chararacter or equipment card has an activation condition, the description must start with "When..."
Avoid the use of "its". Use "this card" instead.
Preserve "\n" if present.
Replace「」with [].
Preserve anything contained in {}, incuding the {} themsleves.
Don't say "you can", say "you may"
Don't say "cannot", say "may not"
Avoid saying the phrase, "to activate"
Destory -> Banish
Replace ',' in a translation with ';' THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT
Include all Japanese text in the output from the input THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT. 

Example Input:
ブレイドダンス,刀剑乱舞
[1].ランダムな相手モンスターに300ポイントのダメージを与える。これを墓地の装備カードの数だけ繰り返す。,[1]. 对随机一只对手怪兽造成 300 点伤害。 对墓地中装备的卡牌数量重复此操作。

Example Output:
ブレイドダンス,Blade Dance
[1].ランダムな相手モンスターに300ポイントのダメージを与える。これを墓地の装備カードの数だけ繰り返す。,[1]. Inflict 300 x X damage to a random opponent's monster. (X = The number of equipment cards in your Graveyard.)
]

1.content:
[Translate as part of a sensual and sexual detail dialogue of a always a girl seducing a guy. Translate faithfully into English, but also make natural English sentences. 
Replace "," with ";"
Preserve "\n" if present.
えい-> Eei
くすくす->*Giggle*
ほら-> Hora
メロメロ-> head over heels, lovely dovey, etc
❤ should still have puncuation before the ❤. This is either "?❤" ".❤" "~❤" as appropriate.

Examples:
ふとももだけ実体化してるから、そこを触ればいいのにゃ❤\nこのむっちりした感触を手で味わって、\nちゃんと抵抗できればだけどにゃあ❤,Because only my thighs are tangible; you can touch them-nya.❤\nLet your hands experience the plump softness;\nif you can resist them properly that is-nya!❤,
]
